properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 5 at 12:32AM PST until February 6 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 11 to 16 feet at 15 seconds.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head
OR out 10 NM.

* WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST THURSDAY... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
